    Class PropertyDrawerFinder

    Finds custom property drawer for a given type. From https://forum.unity.com/threads/solved-custompropertydrawer-not-being-using-in-editorgui-propertyfield.534968/

    Inheritance
    object
    PropertyDrawerFinder
    Namespace: logiked.source.editor
    Assembly: Logiked_Source.dll
    Syntax
    public static class PropertyDrawerFinder

    Methods

    | Improve this Doc View Source

    DrawPropertyField(SerializedProperty, GUIContent)

    Dessine la propriété correctement (avec son drawer custom si elle en possède un). Attention, système d'affichage différent si c'est Unity qui s'occupe d'affichage.

    Declaration
    public static void DrawPropertyField(this SerializedProperty prop, GUIContent label)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    SerializedProperty prop

    La propiété
    GUIContent label

    Le label associé

    DrawPropertyOject(object, GUIContent, Type, params GUILayoutOption[])

    Cette fonction sert à afficher le champ associé à une valeur, peu importe si elle est serializable ou non

    FindDrawerForProperty(SerializedProperty)

    Searches for custom property drawer for given property, or returns null if no custom property drawer was found.

    Declaration
    public static PropertyDrawer FindDrawerForProperty(SerializedProperty property)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    SerializedProperty property
    Returns
    Type Description
    PropertyDrawer
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    FindDrawerForType(Type)

    Returns custom property drawer for type if one could be found, or null if no custom property drawer could be found. Does not use cached values, so it's resource intensive.

    Declaration
    public static PropertyDrawer FindDrawerForType(Type propertyType)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    Type propertyType
    Returns
    Type Description
    PropertyDrawer
